contestingTicket.deadline: Must appear or pay by court date on citation

courtDates.noShow: Failure to appear may result in bench warrant

trafficSchool.description: May be offered to reduce or dismiss charges

localRules.dressCode: Business casual; no shorts or tank tops

specialConsiderations.mandatoryAppearances: Required for reckless driving, DUI, driving suspended
